00025 #include "OgreConfigFile.h"
00026 
00027 #include "OgreException.h"
00028 
00029 namespace Ogre {
00030 
00031     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00032     ConfigFile::ConfigFile()
00033     {
00034     }
00035     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00036     void ConfigFile::load(const String& filename, const String& separators)
00037     {
00038         FILE *fp;
00039         char rec[100], *ret;
00040         String optName, optVal;
00041 
00042         mSettings.clear();
00043 
00044         // Open and parse entire file
00045         fp = fopen(filename, "r");
00046         if( !fp )
00047             Except(
00048                 Exception::ERR_FILE_NOT_FOUND, "'" + filename + "' file not found!", "ConfigFile::load" );
00049 
00050         ret = fgets(rec, 100, fp);
00051         while (ret != NULL)
00052         {
00053             String tst = rec;
00054             tst.trim();
00055             // Ignore comments & blanks
00056             if (tst.length() > 0 && tst.at(0) != '#' && tst.at(0) != '@' && tst.at(0) != '\n')
00057             {
00058                 // Tokenise on tab
00059                 optName = strtok(rec, separators);
00060                 optVal = strtok(NULL, "\n");
00061                 if (optName.length() != 0 && optVal != 0)
00062                 {
00063                     optVal.trim();
00064                     optName.trim();
00065                     mSettings.insert(std::multimap<String, String>::value_type(optName, optVal));
00066                 }
00067             }
00068             ret = fgets(rec, 100, fp);
00069         }
00070 
00071         fclose(fp);
00072 
00073 
00074     }
00075     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00076     String ConfigFile::getSetting(const String& key)
00077     {
00078         std::multimap<String, String>::iterator i;
00079 
00080         i = mSettings.find(key);
00081         if (i == mSettings.end())
00082         {
00083             return "";
00084         }
00085         else
00086         {
00087             return i->second;
00088         }
00089     }
00090     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00091     StringVector ConfigFile::getMultiSetting(const String& key)
00092     {
00093         StringVector ret;
00094 
00095         std::multimap<String, String>::iterator i;
00096 
00097         i = mSettings.find(key);
00098         // Iterate over matches
00099         while (i != mSettings.end() && i->first == key)
00100         {
00101             ret.push_back(i->second);
00102             ++i;
00103         }
00104 
00105         return ret;
00106 
00107 
00108     }
00109 
00110 }
